eu.zidek.augustin.minuscule

Class MinusculeWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.zidek.augustin.minuscule.MinusculeWindow

  • public class MinusculeWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    A Minuscule window that holds a canvas in it.
    Author:
    Augustin Zidek

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MinusculeWindow()
      Creates a default canvas window with a canvas on which basic geometric shapes can be drawn using the methods provided in the Canvas.
      MinusculeWindow(int width, int height)
      Creates a default canvas window with a canvas on which basic geometric shapes can be drawn using the methods provided in the Canvas.
      MinusculeWindow(int width, int height, java.lang.String title, java.awt.Color bgColor)
      Creates a canvas window with a canvas on which basic geometric shapes can be drawn using the methods provided in the Canvas.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Canvas getCanvas() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MinusculeWindow

        public MinusculeWindow()
        Creates a default canvas window with a canvas on which basic geometric shapes can be drawn using the methods provided in the Canvas. The background color of the default canvas is set to white, the window title is set to "Minuscule Canvas". The window od the default canvas is maximized.

      • MinusculeWindow

        public MinusculeWindow(int width,
                       int height)
        Creates a default canvas window with a canvas on which basic geometric shapes can be drawn using the methods provided in the Canvas. The background color of the default canvas is set to white, the window title is set to "Minuscule Canvas".
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the canvas (the width of the window will be slightly bigger).
        height - The height of the canvas (the width of the window will be bigger by the control panel on the bottom).

      • MinusculeWindow

        public MinusculeWindow(int width,
                       int height,
                       java.lang.String title,
                       java.awt.Color bgColor)
        Creates a canvas window with a canvas on which basic geometric shapes can be drawn using the methods provided in the Canvas.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the canvas (the width of the window will be slightly bigger).
        height - The height of the canvas (the width of the window will be bigger by the control panel on the bottom).
        title - The title of the window.
        bgColor - The background color of the canvas.

    • Method Detail

      • getCanvas

        public Canvas getCanvas()
        Returns:
        The canvas within this window that can be drawn on
